event.title: SWmobile: April talk night
event.description:
Mario Viviani - Technology Evangelist, Amazon Appstore

Lightning Talks:

• Andrew Wyld - Machine Learning

• Jan Warner - Dark Arts of WKWebView

• Paul Freeman - Project Tango

• Mike Roberts - Mobile Engagement

The usual format: 

• 18:00-18:15 - organisers/volunteers arrive

• 18:30 doors open / pizza arrive

• 19:00 Intro by SWmobile organiser (venue admin i.e toilets, fire exits)

• 19:05 talk one

• 19:[masked]min comfort break

• 19:50 Lightning talks!

• 20:30 finish up and head to the pub 

• 20:45 Volunteers leave after helping tidy up
